text: hi, one more cuestion, anyway to check in hubl if the content is in edit mode (opened in content editor)
I'm not sure about HubL, but there's a `hs-inline-edit` class on the `html` element, so you can target CSS or JS at the editor
That is the way we do things here.. The only problem is that is HS ever changes that you are SOL.
What are you guys checking that for? Or doing with that information?
<@U25PYL3Q8> I disable video backgrounds in the editor as well as any javascript elements that hide content (ie: sliders) so that the client can see all content while editing.
oh duh. I was confused. thanks. I was thinking this was for something else
